name: Loaded Baked Potatoes
description: Fluffy baked potatoes loaded with classic toppings.
instructions: Prick potatoes all over with a fork.
Rub potatoes with olive oil and sprinkle generously with salt.
Place potatoes directly on the oven rack and bake for 60-75 minutes, or until tender when pierced with a fork.
Once baked, carefully slice the tops lengthwise.
Fluff the inside of the potatoes with a fork.
Top with butter, sour cream/yogurt, cheddar cheese, bacon bits, and green onions.
